== Uzhavoor (628115) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Uzhavoor is a village in the [[Meenachil]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 1255 hectares and harbouring 2454 households with total population of 9063 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palai]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 4485 and female population is 4578. Scheduled Caste Population is 552 and Scheduled Tribes population is 29. Census Location Code of the village is 628115<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
